item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 10 Jan 2023
item.description:
1. OCaml.org: recapping 2022 and queries on the Fediverse
  2. shuttle v0.3.1 released
  3. Blog post: Testing in Seqes
  4. ocplib-simplex v0.5 released
  5. Looking for Participants for User Survey on ocaml.org Package Documentation and Learn Area
  6. Release of ocaml-sf/learn-ocaml:0.14.1
  7. The relationship between call/cc, shift/reset, and effect handlers
  8. 10 years of OUPS, meetup january 2023
  9. ocaml-lsp-server 1.15.0-4.14 and 1.15.0-5.0
  10. OCamlCC: Bazel-enabled OCaml Toolchain (new alpha release)
  11. Other OCaml News
